subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: On a frenetic day that included 25 trades, the Pittsburgh Penguins snatched the biggest prize, Atlanta forward Marian Hossa, adding one of the game’s best snipers to an already potent lineup.
snippet: On a frenetic day that included 25 trades, the Pittsburgh Penguins snatched the biggest prize, Atlanta forward Marian Hossa, adding one of the game’s best snipers to an already potent lineup.
